Entries.9901002/f Thistle 500/t 600 1800/w sunny: music spring1/53 29/farmer 53 35 0 Thistle 53 29 2/skippable/pause 1000/speak Thistle "One pinch of toadstool... two drops of dew..."/pause 500/emote Thistle 8/speak Thistle "Oh! You. You are the farmer."/pause 500/speak Thistle "You're deep in the woods. Most people don't come this far. They're afraid of what might be lurking in the shadows."/pause 500/speak Thistle "But there are no monsters here. Just the old earth, breathing. ...I trust you know how to be quiet?"/end
Entries.9901006/f Thistle 1500/t 1900 2400/w rai: music rain/53 29/farmer 53 35 0 Thistle 53 29 0/skippable/pause 1000/speak Thistle "The rain... it washes the world clean."/pause 500/speak Thistle "Sometimes, living out here... the silence gets loud. Does that make sense?"/pause 500/speak Thistle "I thought I wanted to be alone. But lately... when I see a light in your farmhouse window..."/pause 1000/faceDirection Thistle 2/speak Thistle "I wonder what it would be like to be warm."/end

Entries.9901004/f Thistle 1000/t 1200 2200/d Fri: music piano/25 18/farmer 25 22 0 Thistle 23 20 1 Gus 18 20 1/skippable/pause 1000/speak Gus "Thistle! So good to see you. Can I get you the usual?"/pause 500/speak Thistle "Y-yes. Just cider. Please."/move farmer 0 -2 0/move farmer -1 0 0/speak Thistle "Oh! @. I... I didn't expect to see you here."/speak Thistle "It is loud. There are so many people."/question fork1 "Are you okay?"/fork kind/speak Thistle "I think so. I just... I am used to trees. Trees do not stare."/jump Thistle/speak Thistle "But... the cider is good. Will you sit with me?"/end
Entries.kind: speak Thistle "Thank you. You are... grounding. Like a good root system."/end

Entries.9901008/f Thistle 2000/t 600 900/l Farm: 50s/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Thistle 64 18 0/skippable/pause 1000/speak Thistle "Good morning. I... I did not mean to intrude."/pause 500/speak Thistle "I brought you this. It is a seed from my homeland... or what is left of it."/pause 500/speak Thistle "It is shriveled now. Silent. It used to pulse with life, but the soil here is different."/pause 500/speak Thistle "I think the curator at the museum might know how to revive it. I cannot do it myself. I am too close to the memory."/pause 1000/item cosmicopal.HeartNut 1/speak Thistle "Please. Wake it up."/end
